thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com
thread.title: Dani

author: Dani
title: Dani
text: I really enjoy Hello Fresh. The recipes are easy to make and the ones I don't like as much are easy to manipulate and revamp. The only thing I dislike is that you have to remember to cancel the box early if you don't want it. It makes sense, of course, but I sometimes forget and pay for food I hadn't planned on getting. It's a good business plan but it's a little sneaky and it gets me sometimes.
